html:
Element Materials Technology, a provider of testing, inspection, certification and calibration services for a diverse range of materials, products and technologies in advanced industrial supply chains, has acquired Norton Straw Consultants Ltd., an engineering consultancy services provider. Both the companies involved in the transaction are based in UK.

This acquisition is a further step in the growth of Element Digital Engineering, providing engineering simulation, modelling, data science and artificial intelligence services for customers.

Deal In Brief

Deal TypeAcquisition
Sub-Category100% Acquisition
Deal StatusCompleted: 2021-12-02

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Norton Straw
Acquirer (Company)Element Materials Technology Group Holdings Ltd

Deal Rationale

% Acquisition100%
